features.title: New Connector selection!
features.desc: Find the perfect device using our new Connector selection screen! Filter the Connectors by name, description or even Network!

features.title: Create your own Connectors
features.desc: Now you can create your own Connectors that will appear in the Connector selection screen!

features.title: Create your own Networks
features.desc: You can also create Networks integrations and associate Connectors to them!
